summary: TAKATA RECALL - NHTSA RECALL DATED JULY 2016 STILL HAS NO SOLUTION IN PLACE ALMOST A YEAR AFTER THE RECALL NOTICE WAS ISSUED.  THE DEFECTIVE AIR BAG HAS BEEN IN MY CAR SINCE 2007.  HOW LONG CAN IT TAKE FOR FORD TO COME UP WITH A SOLUTION, ESPECIALLY WHEN SAFETY IS AT RISK?  UNSATISFACTORY.
